response.original_title: ELECTRONICOS FANTASTICOS! 電磁饗宴篇 - In The Electromagnetic Feast
response.overview: In 2022, the group performed for the first time at the FUJI ROCK FESTIVAL, and the audience went into a wild dance frenzy with their Japanese style festival music which is played entirely with electrical appliances. Now, the first video piece by such an exceptional project is here. Complete recording of the performance they hosted at Kanda Myojin Hall in Tokyo in the fall of 2022.
response.title: ELECTRONICOS FANTASTICOS! 電磁饗宴篇 - In The Electromagnetic Feast
